affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 120/120/120/120
COOLDOWN: 12
desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.
lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
name: tidehunter_gush

desc:
Creates a thick armor shell that reduces physical damage and removes negative buffs when damage received reaches a critical threshold.
Kraken Shell does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.
notes:
Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards buff removal.
The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for 6 seconds.
Kraken Shell removes most buffs, even if they are generally not purgable.
lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
name: tidehunter_kraken_shell

cmb:
MANA COST: 30/40/50/60
COOLDOWN: 7/6/5/4
desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
notes: Works on Ancient creeps (but not on Roshan)
lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
name: tidehunter_anchor_smash

cmb:
MANA COST: 150/225/325
COOLDOWN: 150
desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
notes:
Ravage will hit invisible units.
Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of 775.
lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
name: tidehunter_ravage
